doc.previous: The start of the 21st century has been marked by controversies over depictions of Muhammad not only for recent caricatures or cartoons but also regarding the display of historical artwork
doc.after: In a story on morals at the end of the millennium in December 1999 the German news magazine Der Spiegel printed on the same page pictures of moral apostles Muhammad Jesus Confucius and Immanuel Kant In the subsequent weeks the magazine received protests petitions and threats against publishing the picture of Muhammad The Turkish TV station Show TV broadcast the telephone number of an editor who then received daily calls 59
